name: RunAway
description:
Runner game that was created at the BBQGameJam 2015. Look for #bbqgamejam for details.

Run away from the dog and avoid to get bitten.

Keys: W to jump, S to drop a sausage, E to eat a sausage.

The game supports Linux, Windows, Mac.

Credits:
Moe
eggwithcheese
PriorBlue
R0Age0D
PixelGuy
Phaselock

Find the source code here: https://github.com/Moe-/RunAway
